tweet.text: We are happy to announce and welcome four new members to the @HistoryAtState Advisory Committee On Historical Diplomatic Documentation. Welcome to @APSAtweets Daryl Press, @SHAFRhistorians David Engerman, and At-Large members Adriane Lentz-Smith and Julia Irwin. #twitterstorians
tweet.html: We are happy to announce and welcome four new members to the @HistoryAtState Advisory Committee On Historical Diplomatic Documentation. Welcome to @APSAtweets Daryl Press, @SHAFRhistorians David Engerman, and At-Large members Adriane Lentz-Smith and Julia Irwin. #twitterstorians
